department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.ch: “1. Introduce basic concepts and techniques of machine learning.2. Develop abilities to apply machine learning models for practical problems.“
goal.en: “1. Introduce basic concepts and techniques of machine learning.2. Develop abilities to apply machine learning models for practical problems.“

outline.ch: “1. Traditional supervised learning algorithms2. Traditional unsupervised learning algorithms3. Deep learning algorithms4. Recommender systems“
outline.en: “1. Traditional supervised learning algorithms2. Traditional unsupervised learning algorithms3. Deep learning algorithms4. Recommender systems“

textbook.ch: “““The Elements of Statistical Learning““ by Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani, and Jerome Friedman““Deep Learning““ by Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville“
textbook.en: “““The Elements of Statistical Learning““ by Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani, and Jerome Friedman““Deep Learning““ by Ian Goodfellow, Yoshua Bengio, and Aaron Courville“

flexDiscription.ch: We will provide additional materials for self-study.  Office hours remain open.

ch: 系所:限資訊工程學系碩士班、資訊工程學系軟體工程碩士班、資訊工程學系AI碩士班、資訊工程學系博士班。
系所:限資訊工程學系、資訊電機學院學士班。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限學分學程-巨量資料分析、第二專長-人工智慧。
系所:限人工智慧國際碩士學位學程。
en: Department:MSc in Computer Science and Information Engineering、Institute of Software Engineering、Master‘s Program in Artificial Intelligence, Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、PhD in Computer Science and Information Engineering only.
Department:Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering、Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:Specialty Program-Big Data Analysis、Minor Specialty-Artificial Intelligence only.
